channel.title: First attempt at actual video editing. Rage 2 Gameplay
channel.description: The quality of the video gets better as it goes on, as I've been learning as I go, messing with bit rates and other settings. So much fun to play this game, any criticism's/suggestions would be appreciated! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N0p6Qba59Cg

item.title: First attempt at actual video editing. Rage 2 Gameplay
item.dc:creator: drgibbles
item.description:
Not exactly sure what you mean. I have been trying to learn video editing and have been messing with clips from the games I play. Put another one up yesterday, better than the first, but still a long way to go.

item.title: First attempt at actual video editing. Rage 2 Gameplay
item.dc:creator: CPU
item.description:
Tried watching it but I couldn’t
The video started out great but what stopped me was the music.
Simply put, I thought it was awful and irritating. I was looking for video highlights and instead got bombarded with sound that was, in my personal opinion, worse than terrible.

Sorry…

Read full topic
